title: Which has more weightage in the JEE Mains and Advanced, the class 11 syllabus or the class 12 syllabus? - Quora

response.answer_text: No one can be 100% sure about weightage. But generally it's 60–40 for 11th and 12th respectively. But for jee advanced, you can't depend on above scenario. For example, Jee advanced generally uses mechanics (class 11th) concept for the Electromagnetism(class 12th) and capacitor(class 12th) related problems. So, you need to cover each concept thoroughly to crack advanced ..!!

Roughly, it is 40:60 ratio but exactly we can't predict as the questions formed in JEE include a mixture of concepts from both Class 11 and 12 like A question could have the concepts of Magnetics as well as Kinematics. All the best !
